message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $14,000 is a good starting point, but I'm really looking to stay under $13,000.  Would you be willing to consider that?

I understand you're looking to stay under $13,000, Bob, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
